cat_seo_description: Buy latest Acer Monitor at best price in Bangladesh. Find your favorite Acer monitor model at lowest price. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch.
full_description:
Acer K202QBI 19.5 Inch HD+ Monitor

The Acer K202QBI is a compact and efficient 19.5-inch monitor designed for everyday computing tasks. With its HD+ resolution of 1600 x 900, it provides a clear and sharp display, ideal for web browsing, document editing, and multimedia playback. Featuring a Twisted Nematic (TN) panel, the monitor offers fast response times and a 75Hz refresh rate, ensuring smoother visuals and reducing screen tearing compared to standard 60Hz monitors. Its 6ms response time minimizes motion blur and ghosting, enhancing the viewing experience during fast-paced scenes or gaming. The Acer K202QBI has both VGA and HDMI connections, so it can work with a variety of gadgets, including media players, game consoles, and older PCs. Flexible installation choices are made possible by the monitor's VESA mount compatibility, which lets users put it on a wall or an adjustable arm stand to free up desk space. Deeper blacks and brighter whites are produced by the dynamic contrast ratio of 100,000,000:1, which enhances overall image quality and makes for a more engaging viewing experience. The Acer K202QBI is a versatile and practical monitor that combines essential features with reliable performance, making it a suitable choice for both personal and professional use.

full_description:
Acer EK220Q E3bi 21.5" 1ms 100Hz Borderless IPS FHD Monitor

The Acer EK220Q E3bi is a borderless monitor that provides excellent performance, quality, and style for your viewing needs. Its 21.5-inch display with borderless design allows for a vast and immersive viewing area. The Acer Monitor also features an IPS (In-Plane Switching) panel, which may produce rich and realistic colors, broad viewing angles, and rapid reaction times. It also offers a Full HD resolution (1920 x 1080), allowing you to see clear and detailed visuals in your games, movies, and applications. It also offers a 100Hz refresh rate, which ensures smooth and fluid action for fast-paced games and videos. The Acer EK220Q E3bi is a borderless monitor that provides excellent performance, quality, and style for your viewing needs. Its 21.5-inch display allows for a vast and immersive viewing area. The Acer Monitor also features an IPS (In-Plane Switching) panel, which may produce rich and realistic colors, broad viewing angles, and rapid reaction times. It also offers a Full HD resolution (1920 x 1080), allowing you to see clear and detailed visuals in your games, movies, and applications. It also offers a 100Hz refresh rate, which ensures smooth and fluid action for fast-paced games and videos. The Borderless display also features AMD FreeSync technology, which synchronizes the panel's refresh rate with your device's frame rate, eliminating tearing and stuttering for a smooth and fluid gaming experience. The Acer EK220Q E3bi 21.5" 1ms 100Hz Borderless FHD Monitor also includes eye care features such as BlueLight Shield, Flickerless, and Acer ComfyView, which can reduce blue light output, flickering, and glare while protecting your eyes from strain and tiredness. The Monitor display also features tilt settings ranging from -5 to 20 degrees, allowing you to alter its position for the best viewing angle. It also features a wall mount option, which can help you save desk space and increase viewing versatility.
